name: Leaf Lens Web Platform
desc: Developed a web-based platform using Flask to assist farmers in detecting plant diseases and offering fertilizer recommendations using Tensorflow.

name: Snake Game using Tkinter
desc: Developed a classic Snake game using Python's Tkinter library for GUI and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles.

name: Blog Website using Flask
desc: Developed a dynamic blog website with Flask. Designed UI with user authentication, post creation, and commenting features.

name: Ping Pong game
desc: Developed a classic Ping Pong game using Python's Tkinter library for GUI and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles.
